author: rhoegg
msg: Added test and patch for Bug 15097.  Problem was that SimpleXmlRpcClient
did not detect fault responses.  It now passes the test.  Thanks to Wim

author: rhoegg
msg: Modified SimpleXmlRpcClient to use a default (currently only) encoding
of ISO-8859-1 to mirror the functionality of XmlRpcClient.  Thanks to
David Wo <dwo@vet.com.au>.  This was in response to Bug 8686.

author: rhoegg
msg: Applied patch from Bug 8397.  Thanks to Lachlan O'Dea <odela01@ca.com>

author: rhoegg
msg: Added test class for SimpleXmlRpcClient functionality.  First new test
tests proper encoding and decoding of <, because of Bug 8397
